attributes.title: DO NOT TRUST THE FALSE PUMPKIN KING😔
attributes.review:
I saw this wonderful app on tik tok so I decided I wanted to do my part and help out wonderful pumpkin king win this next election!! 😌✨ BUT I NEVER EXPECTED THIS!!!!! After I downloaded the app my room went dark... I felt SO AFRAID!! So I tried to turn on my phones flash light... when suddenly!!... I SAW WHAT LOOKED LIKE A SMALL CARROT ON MY SCREEN!!! I FELT SO AFRAID, I thought to myself.. “who would put a carrot on my screen?!?!?!” AND THEN IT HIT ME!! This app was recruiting all orange things to be representatives for trump the pumpkin 🎃 KING 🤴... and then when I thought it couldn’t get any worse.... I tried to play some soothing music, so of course I played gods menu, how you like that, and stay gold becuause STAN BTS, BLACKPINK, AND STRAY KIDS. But.... the I heard it... A TRUMP SPEECH BEGAN TO PLAY OVER MY BLUETOOTH SPEAKER. I thought, hm... perhaps I will go turn it off.. but then. THE CARROT IN MY SCREEN JUMPED OUT AND STARTED SCREAMING IN MY FACE “TRUMP 2020, TRUMP 2020, TRUMP 2020” and I said “why mr carrot, please stop harassing me!” But he persisted! So i went to try and delete his app, but he started chanting in a language I couldn’t understand!! And he summoned his baby carrot disciples, and they began attacking me!! So I prayed to the gods to please help me. And then they appeared, my saviors. BTS, STRAYKIDS, BLACKPINK, ITZY, and SO MANY MORE. They began to fight off the evil orange minions and after a long battle they defeated them ! ❤️✨😌 the orange carcasses splayed out across my floor, I looked down in disgust. But then I heard my playlist of kpop bops begin to play and the kings and queens who fought for me looked at me with a smile, and just as they defended from the heavens in a blink of an eye. They left. So while I was listening to stay gold I hit “delete” on the trump 2020 app, and all of the little orange carcasses disappeared. As if... as if- it had never happened. 

Moral of the story, DO NOT TRUST THE FALSE PUMPKIN KING, AND DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! ❌😡🦶

instead, 𝕾𝖙𝖆𝖓 𝕭𝕿𝕾, 𝕾𝖙𝖗𝖆𝖞 𝕶𝖎𝖉𝖘, 𝕬𝖓𝖉 𝕭𝖑𝖆𝖈𝖐𝕻𝖎𝖓𝖐 💕💫✨😌
